{"title": "Beyond Solar", "title_search": "beyond solar", "title_keyword": "beyond solar", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/beyond-solar/", "summary": "Beyond Solar is a pixel art vertical shooter that takes the players through a challenging journey to reveal the truth about the great migration of human beings to the outer space void.  You are \"Gravity\" a young pilot who grew up in the space colony \"ARD\", humanity last hope and shelter after life on planet Earth reached the brink of extinction. Earth for \"Gravity\" is nothing but a bed time story he used to hear growing up in the colony until one day a distress signal was received from Earth!
